title: How will Qualcomm move on 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: Qualcomm already supports a number of 5G processors (Snapdragon 865, 865+, 768G, 765G etc.,). However, these are targeted at mobile devices. Right now, some of these processors support Artificial Intelligence capability. This would help Qualcomm to support Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality applications in the future.
